column2: Job Description We invite you to bring your competence as BIM Coordinator who has the capability to co-ordinate with multi-disciplinary design teams in building/ transportation / water markets. The BIM coordinator should be able to develop BIM framework for new/existing project, should have in depth knowledge of BIS / NBS codes, CoBie extensions and AIM/PIM processes. The BIM coordinator should have insight and knowledge of digital contracts within the project to ensure operational execution according to ??e.g. the BIM Execution Plan ??is followed by all disciplines in the project. The BIM coordinator is responsible for the multidisciplinary data and metadata coordination, quality control and control of digital models and drawing files from the different technical areas of the project, as well as support for digital deliveries. You will join our REC ? department As our new BIM Coordinator, you will be part of a world class, innovation driven engineering design Centre owned by an independent trust and its employees. REC is a highly sophisticated center of engineering excellence and based in our India head office in Gurgaon. Working in partnership with all our established offices globally, the Ramboll Engineering Centre (REC) is a Centre for excellence in design by offering optimized solutions to the rest of the organization. Your key tasks and responsibilities will be:   Ensure that we work according to digital requirements and follow our digital processes.   Coordinate with the project members.   Managing the project's digital requirements.   Working according to our Digital Delivery Plan (BIM Execution Plan).   Quality-assuring our digital processes.   Assisting the BIM strategist in driving the project forward with a focus on efficient information management.   Supporting the project's various discipline model coordinators.   Responsible for the project's digital and data/metadata requirements, including project and client data and CAD needs.   Collaborate with project managers and control the exchange of information and deliverables on issues related to digital design.   Ensure and monitor digital information delivery and control, with a focus on metadata.   Provide answers to technical/data questions and, if necessary, communicate these answers to the project team.   Report skills and training needs to the Department Manager/Team Lead.

column2: Project Role : Engineering Services Practitioner Project Role Description : Assist with end-to-end engineering services to develop technical engineering solutions to solve problems and achieve business objectives. Solve engineering problems and achieve business objectives using scientific, socio-economic, technical knowledge and practical experience. Work across structural and stress design, qualification, configuration and technical management.  Must have skills : Illustration Design Good to have skills : Technical Writing Minimum  0-2  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BE MECHANICAL or AERO Summary :As an Illustration Designer in the Engineering Services team, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing designs and illustrations for technical engineering solutions. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, understanding project requirements, and delivering high-quality designs within tight deadlines.  Roles & Responsibilities: Create visually appealing designs and illustrations for technical engineering solutions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality designs within tight deadlines. Ensure designs are in line with brand guidelines and project specifications. Stay updated with the latest design trends and techniques to continuously improve the quality of designs. Assist with end-to-end engineering services to develop technical engineering solutions to solve problems and achieve business objectives. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Illustration Design. Good To Have Skills:Technical Writing. Strong understanding of design principles and techniques. Experience with design software such as Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and deliver high-quality designs within tight deadlines. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 0-2 years of experience in Illustration Design. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in design or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful designs. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification BE MECHANICAL or AERO

Advocate research findings to teams and stakeholders through written and oral presentations.     Ask questions, gather data, and analyze data.     Experienced with a diverse set of design and wireframing tools including Sketch, Figma, Zeplin and Axure. Proficiency in Adobe Suite (Specially Adobe XD, Illustrator and Photoshop)     Proven track record with relevant experience in UX design, showcasing a strong understanding of design principles and methodologies.     Demonstrated ability to conduct thorough user research, usability studies, and interpret data to inform design decisions and enhance user experiences.     A portfolio that highlights a range of professional design projects, emphasizing successful contributions to creating intuitive, accessible, and seamless user interfaces.     Out of box creative thinking, eye for detail and adaptability to new design technologies.     Ability to work independently with no or very little supervision

column2: GBL s Senior Design Associate will be responsible for developing design-led programs with existing and new stakeholders around GBL s key research areas.          Generate clear ideas, concepts, reports and outcomes, working closely      with a growing team of economists, development practitioners, and labor industry experts.         The role will require imaginative, entrepreneurial, and collaborative talent to identify design directions that meet research standards in an evidence-based research ecosystem.                  Qualification & Experience:           (The areas of knowledge and expertise that matter most for this role)             Passionate about tackling complex social and organization level challenges.         Hands-on experience with product and service design & development.         A graduate (minimum 2 years of work experience)/ post-graduate degree minimum 1 year work experience) in design.         Proficient in Adobe creative suite, Miro and other relevant design tools         A portfolio demonstrating your work and design research skills.         Comfortable working with a wide range of stakeholders, including groups that may not have previous experience of strategic use of design in the        VUCA         (Vulnerable, Uncertain, Complex, Ambiguous)        environment.          Excellent interpersonal and written, visual, and verbal communication skills.                   Roles & Responsibilities:           (Areas that will play to your strength and all the responsibilities we will trust you with)               At GBL each one of us is involved in multiple projects and works efficiently through trans-disciplinary collaboration. You will be involved in developing solutions in highly complex ecosystems where you have to apply your design intelligence to create a sustainable, scalable, and replicable intervention. The nature of intervention can be:            Digital or physical Products         Process design & innovation         Systems and nudges for behavior change         Service ecosystem         Communications to convey our findings and value propositions         And beyond                       Develop design case studies, research and publications, disseminating them to a global community of development practitioners.         Design at GBL is a growing vertical where we are developing design processes & strategies for development practitioners, economists and the employers, who own labor-intensive businesses. We would rely on your design expertise to facilitate this goal.         Design, develop and test interventions for impact evaluation projects.          Create pitches and funding applications for design projects.         Lead internal design capacity building sessions through design sprints & workshops.         Formulate research plans, manage quality and timelines across team members, taking responsibility for work output         Carry out secondary research independently as per research plan         Create field research plans as well as carry out user research on field as per GBL s ethical guidelines and standards.         Independently work with internal and external stakeholders to complete a task to the required standard and deadline.         Can represent GBL at external forums with some guidance, having a good understanding of the industry / context in which GBL operates                     What should you be comfortable with?           A dynamic environment with competing priorities.         Working in a team with shared responsibilities.         Independently coordinating with coworkers to accomplish goals.         Being resourceful in new environments and scenarios.         Problem-solving in high-pressure environments.         Adapting your approach, being focused on the problem and not being stuck to one idea or way of solving a problem.

column2: WHAT YOU DO AT AMD CHANGES EVERYTHING          We care deeply about transforming lives with AMD technology to enrich our industry,  our communities,  and the world.  Our mission is to build great products that accelerate next-generation computing experiences   the building blocks for the data center,  artificial intelligence,  PCs,  gaming and embedded.  Underpinning our mission is the AMD culture.  We push the limits of innovation to solve the world s most important challenges.  We strive for execution excellence while being direct,  humble,  collaborative,  and inclusive of diverse perspectives.          AMD together we advance_            MTS DFT Design Engineer                      THE ROLE:            As a member of the S3 SoC DFT Team,  the successful candidate will own the DFT micro-architecture and RTL implementation using Verilog/System Verilog for the next gen of AMD S3 SoCs. )         Position includes test creation/development,  characterization,  data analysis,  and silicon debug of DFT Scan/ATPG test in leading edge process technologies.  AMD's environment is fast paced,  results oriented and built upon a legion of forward-thinking people with a passion for winning technology!                   THE PERSON:            A successful person in this role would be able to work in a collaborative team environment working with the RTL designers and other Verification Engineers to find creative ways to accelerate the identification of functional defects        Strong self-driving ability,  Should have excellent communication skills (both written and oral)        Strong problem-solving skills                    KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:            Working closely with the DFT Architecture and the various IP Design teams to align on the DFT requirements and successfully implementing the DFT RTL at the SoC level        Working closely with the ATPG team for coverage support,  with the DV team on helping debugging and root-causing the test failures and with the PD team on DFT timing closure                PREFERRED EXPERIENCE:            Experience in DFT architecture for complex chips        Experience in RTL development using Verilog/System Verilog having worked on RTL for IP and SoC integration        Proficient in doing basic unit-level verification using simulations.         Experience with RTL quality check tools/methodologies such as Spyglass,  CDC,  Lint is required.         Must have experience with integration of various IPs into complex SOCs.         Exposure to Static timing analysis & Timing closure is required.         Any prior experience with microprocessor designs is a plus. column2: As a Concept Designer at DART, you will be an integral part of our innovative and dynamic design team, responsible for creating captivating and cutting-edge space concepts that align with our clients visions and objectives       Your role will involve conceptualizing and strategizing unique retail experiences that not only meet client requirements but also push the boundaries of creativity and functionality     You will be expected to deliver compelling design solutions that resonate with consumers and drive business growth for our clients            Key Responsibilities         Design Concept Development:    Collaborate with the project team to interpret client briefs and translate them into compelling and feasible space design concepts. Ensure that designs reflect the brand identity, values, and marketing objectives of the client.           Strategy Formulation:    Analyze client requirements and market trends to develop effective strategies that optimize the spaces functionality, customer flow, and overall user experience. Implement innovative and practical ideas that set our designs apart.           Ideation and Innovation:    Cultivate a culture of innovation by regularly brainstorming and exploring new design ideas, technologies, materials, and spatial concepts. Strive to bring fresh and forward-thinking approaches to each project.           Client Presentations:    Prepare visually engaging and informative design decks that showcase the proposed concepts and strategies. Articulate the technical aspects of the design to clients effectively and address any queries or concerns they may have.           Market Research:    Stay abreast of the latest design trends, consumer behavior, and industry developments. Conduct in-depth market research to understand emerging technologies, materials, and best practices to incorporate into our designs.           Technical Expertise:    Possess a strong understanding of space design technicalities, such as layout planning, fixture design, lighting, and signage. Collaborate with technical teams to ensure that designs are feasible and can be implemented successfully.           Brand Alignment:    Ensure that each concept aligns with the clients brand identity and storytelling. Incorporate the brands ethos into the design to create a cohesive and immersive customer experience.           Project Collaboration:    Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including architects, graphic designers, and project managers, to deliver integrated and comprehensive solutions.       Requirements       Bachelors degree in design, Interior Designor or related field.          Proven experience in space design, experiential design, or related fields with a strong portfolio showcasing innovative and successful design concepts.         Proficiency in design software, such as PhotoShop, Figma etc         Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey design ideas to clients and internal teams.         Strong knowledge of current design trends, materials, and technologies.         Ability to multitask, work under pressure, and meet project deadlines.         Exceptional creative thinking, problem-solving, and attention to detail.         A passion for creating exceptional space design experiences and staying ahead of industry trends.
column11: Retail, Software design, Concept development, Strategy formulation, Conceptualization, Market research, Customer experience, Layout planning, Photoshop

column2: We are seeking drafting experience at all levels, from entry level to 10 or more years. Level and salary will be commensurate with experience.     These positions support Elliott s Unit Design group (EP). The primary function of this position is to create design layouts and drawings to support Engineered Products orders via CAD technology         Responsibilities         Works with Engineering data communicated through sketches or by written / oral descriptions and applies all Drafting Manual and/or Work Instructions     Responsible for reviewing and releasing all work assignments in addition to providing information to the department Supervisor for scheduling requirements.     Primarily an individual contributor but has the responsibility to direct shop order activities for Draftsman and Detailer level positions.     Analyzes design requests and discusses requirements with the requisitioner to identify principles and offer suggested revisions.     Analyzes design specifications, requisitions and vendor prints, and unit layout drawings to identify the requirements of drawings.     Details and/or checks completed drawings for pictorial, dimensional, structural, and functional wording accuracy and inclusion of all necessary information.     Prepares a design layout by drawing the components based upon provided information with consideration given to the functional efficiency and cost of the design concepts.     Designs special tools, jigs and fixtures necessary for the assembly, disassembly and shipment of equipment.     Maintains related records and files.     Provides drafting procedure and product change suggestions for consideration and review.     Performs the functions of a Drafting Project Administrator, Checker, Draftsman, and Detailer when required.         Qualifications         Associate degree in specialized technology with drafting experience ranging from entry level to 10+ years.     Experience using AutoCAD and Creo preferred.     Background in rotating equipment and/or machining a plus.     Windchill experience a plus.
column11: Project Administrator, AutoCAD, Draughtsman, Department Supervisor, CAD, Manager Technology, Scheduling, Individual Contributor, Cost
